SELECT A.ORDER_SHT_DETA_ID AS ORDER_SHT_DETA_ID, A.PRDT_ID AS PRDT_ID, A.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, A.QY AS QY, P.PRDT_NM AS PRDT_NM
FROM ORDER_SHT_DETA A JOIN PRDT P ON A.PRDT_ID = P.PRDT_ID ORDER BY ORDER_SHT_DETA_ID ASC
SELECT LOT_NO AS LOT_NO, IST_OUST_DTTM AS IST_OUST_DTTM, PRDT_ID AS PRDT_ID, IST_QY AS IST_QY, OUST_QY AS OUST_QY, EXPDATE AS EXPDATE FROM PRDT_INST_OUST WHERE PRDT_ID = #{prdtId}

SELECT A.LOT_NO AS LOT_NO, A.PRDT_ID AS PRDT_ID, A.QY AS QY, A.PROD_DT AS PROD_DT, A.EXPDATE AS EXPDATE, A.FG AS FG, B.OUST_QY AS OUST_QY, B.IST_OUST_DTTM AS IST_OUST_DTTM, B.IST_QY AS IST_QY FROM PRDT_STC A JOIN PRDT_INST_OUST B ON A.PRDT_ID = B.PRDT_ID WHERE A.PRDT_ID = #{prdtId} ORDER BY LOT_NO ASC
